description: Mobile techniques used by MoustachedBouncer, ATT&CK group G1019 (v1.0)
name: MoustachedBouncer (G1019)

techniques.comment: [MoustachedBouncer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1019) has used legitimate looking filenames for malicious executables including MicrosoftUpdate845255.exe.(Citation: MoustachedBouncer ESET August 2023)
